Activity: Arrive at the office. Check emails and calendar. Review the progress on the audit procedures.
Finalize the preliminary audit plan, incorporating the risk assessment and audit procedures. Ensure the plan is comprehensive and covers all key areas.
Send the preliminary audit plan to @coo-1 (Chief Operating Officer) and @comp-1 (Compliance Officer) for review and feedback. Request a meeting to discuss the plan in detail.

Meeting with @facc-1 (Fund Accountant) and @coo-1 (Chief Operating Officer) to discuss accounting policies and procedures. Gather information on the fund's chart of accounts, general ledger, and reporting processes.
Review the fund's existing accounting policies and procedures. Identify any gaps or inconsistencies with industry best practices and regulatory requirements.
Begin developing recommendations for improving the fund's accounting policies and procedures. Focus on areas where greater clarity or control is needed.
End of day. Organize my workspace and prepare for tomorrow.
